articles.title: Kim Jong Un Declares Construction of Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Declares Construction of Ryomyong Street
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, declared the construction of Ryomyong Street and set forth the tasks for it on the spot, though he was very busy with his guidance over the 70-day campaign while disciplining the enemies' anti-DPRK moves in the Paektu attack spirit.
					 The street is to be built in an area between the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and Ryonghung Crossroads in Pyongyang.
					
					 Seeing the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state, and Ryongnam Hill where the leader made a historic oath "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee", Kim Jong Un named the street to be built "Ryomyong Street" in the meaning that it is a significant place from where the dawn breaks in the Korean revolution.
					
					 He examined a layout of the street, a map showing the bird's eye view of it and its model board and gave instructions for building the street into a monumental edifice strikingly displaying the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science and talents and the might of socialist Korea.
					
					 The essence of its construction is to splendidly build apartment houses for scientists and researchers including educators of Kim Il Sung University, nursery, kindergarten, laundry, post office and other public buildings and public service amenities, he said, stressing the need to push forward the construction of Building No. 3 of the university at the same time.
					
					 It is the Party's intention to turn Ryomyong Street into an energy-saving and green street in the 21st century, he said, adding that the designing and construction units should set it as a goal to ensure the lighting and heating systems for the houses and public buildings with solar panels, geothermal energy and natural lighting and build rooftop greenhouses to go green.
					
					 Saying that he would dispatch the solider-builders, who took part in the construction of Mirae Scientists Street, to the construction of Ryomyong Street on the order of the KPA Supreme Commander, he gave an instruction that the entire party, state and society should render positive assistance to the construction and the Cabinet, commissions, ministries and national institutions take the lead in this work.
					
					 The construction of the street is not merely for formation of a street but serves as a political occasion of clearly showing the spirit of the DPRK standing up and keeping up with the world, despite all sorts of sanctions and pressure by the U.S. imperialists and their followers, the appearance of the country advancing to realize the great ideal of the people and the truth that the DPRK is able to be well-off in its own way and nothing is impossible for it to do, he said.
					
					 Noting that the construction of Ryomyong Street is a fierce battle with the U.S. imperialists and their followers, he called for completing the construction within this year to inspire the servicepersons and people with faith in sure victory and optimism and demonstrate the might of the DPRK fighting its way out with conviction in the rosy future and the traditions of ever-victorious Juche Korea that the world has neither understood nor can do.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won, Kim Yo Jong and Kim Chang Gwang, vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: 18th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held Here
articles.content:
18th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held Here
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The 18th Kimilsungia Festival is to be held with splendor at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition from mid-April, Juche 105 (2016) on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, working people of various strata, school youth and children, the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other overseas Korean organizations and foreign friends will take part in the festival.
					
					 There will also take place Kimilsungia exhibitions and visits to Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses in local areas.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A sports team of the Korean students in Japan led by Song Se Bak visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues and paid homage to them.

articles.title: New Anticancer Medicine Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Anticancer Medicine Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Tumor Institute of the Academy of Medical Science in the DPRK developed a new anticancer medicine.
					 The medicine, made with Sophora angustifolia, aralia shoots and Scutellaria baicalensis, was confirmed to be more efficacious than existing Sophora angustifolia injection developed in 2008 and have no side effect.
					
					 It was already applied to patients with gastric cancer in the Tumor Institute and other hospitals, proving highly effective.
					
					 As it is made with locally available materials, it can be manufactured at Koryo medicine factories across the country.

articles.title: New Strains of Crops Bred
articles.content:
New Strains of Crops Bred
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK bred new varieties of crops.
					 One of them is a new strain of salt-resisting rice with stronger vitality.
					
					 It was cultivated in some tideland-turned fields of South Hwanghae and South Phyongan provinces to be proved highly productive.
					
					 Another is new corn highly resistant to harmful insects.
					
					 Efforts are paid to cultivating those new strains in different co-op farms across the country.

articles.title: Collectivist Emulation, Mode of Struggle Peculiar to Korean People
articles.content:
Collectivist Emulation, Mode of Struggle Peculiar to Korean People
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- All sectors and units of the national economy in the DPRK are making signal successes in the ongoing 70-day campaign, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's call on waging collectivist emulation for making leaps and bounds.
					 The DPRK people have made great leap forward in production and construction through mass movements and collectivist emulation in every stage of the Korean revolution under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It was in February Juche 48 (1959) that President Kim Il Sung visited the Kangson Steel Plant to kindle the torch of the Chollima workteam movement, a collective innovation one.
					
					 Through this movement, the DPRK people carried out the socialist industrialization within 14 years under the slogans "One for all and all for one!" and "Charge at the speed of Chollima!"
					
					 Also in the 1970s, 1980s, 1990s and 2000s, they brought about the heyday of the WPK era by creating the high speed of advance in the overall fields of national economy under the wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his lifetime gave field guidance to a great number of units to arouse them to the socialist emulation for increased production.
					
					 Now supreme leader Kim Jong Un gives ceaseless on-the-spot guidance to factories and other industrial establishments to encourage them to take the lead in the general advance for building a thriving nation. Thanks to his energetic leadership, world-startling achievements have been made in the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Scholar on Japan's Past Crimes
articles.content:
DPRK Scholar on Japan's Past Crimes
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Japan is resorting to all sorts of tricks to gloss over the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					The Japanese authorities in the Mar. 7 answer to the question put by the UN Committee on the Elimination of Discrimination against Women asserted that any "evidence of forcible drafting of comfort women by the army and government organs was not found." And the Japanese Foreign Ministry opened to the public a document saying "the testimonies of forcible drafting of comfort women by the Japanese army and government officials were not confirmed."
					
					In this regard, Dr. Kim Pyong Chol of Kim Il Sung University told KCNA:
					
					Japan is so shameless enough to deny the coercion involved in the sexual slavery, which has been in the world limelight. Such behavior of Japan can not be construed otherwise than an open challenge to the historical truth.
					
					There are a number of evidences witnessing that the Japanese imperialists forcibly drafted a number of women from Korea and other countries to make them sexual slaveries for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					Evidences made public in the 1990s alone show that the army and the government of Japan directly organized the crime of sexual slavery with the approval of wartime Prime Minister Hideki Tojo and even the Japanese King was involved in it.
					
					A professor of Johns Hopkins University in the United States opened to the public in 2013 a document saying that the establishment of "comfort stations" under strict rules was approved by military authorities in all areas where the Japanese army stationed.
					
					The confidential documents in the archives of the Ministry of Defense of Japan prove that the Japanese government gave specific instructions to military units to run "comfort stations" with Korean women as sexual slavery.
					
					In the face of such manifest facts, Japan is repeating the impudent assertion on "evidence" to cover up its bloodstained past crimes in a bid to pave the way for revival of militarism and reinvasion.
					
					But history can never be changed with strained insistence and denial.
					
					It is good for Japan to be honest to the international community, mindful that any attempt to cover up its past crimes will lead Japan to isolation and ruin.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Purpose of U.S. Nuclear Carrier Flotilla's Entry into S. Korea
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Purpose of U.S. Nuclear Carrier Flotilla's Entry into S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The flotilla of nuclear carrier USS John C Stennis entered into Pusan Port on March 13. In this regard, the south Korean warmongers blustered that the U.S. dispatch of its nuclear carrier task force was a "strong warning message to the north" and "manifestation of the will for a severe punishment."
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says: The action taken by the U.S. is not just to threaten the DPRK but to fight against it at any cost.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean warmongers calculate they can browbeat the DPRK through such maneuvers, that is no more than a daydream, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 As clarified through the statement of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, it is the Juche-oriented counter-operation mode of the KPA to immediately contain and wipe out by force of arms the enemy troops and means involved in the operation the moment it judges their implementation of the scenario to intrude into inviolable territory, air and waters over which the DPRK's sovereignty is exercised.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are fully ready to counter the enemies' landing drill aiming at "advance into Pyongyang" with the operation to liberate the whole of south Korea including Seoul and the enemies' tactics of "high-density strike" with an ultra-precision blitzkrieg strike of the Korean style. The revolutionary armed forces are waiting for the moment to make a preemptive strike of justice at the hordes of aggressors.
					
					 If the aggressors misjudge the firm resolution of the KPA to annihilate them and recklessly come in attack on it, it will never miss the golden chance but wipe out them to the last man so that they may not harbor such wild dream and thus defeat them in the war of aggression and win victory in the great war for national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Victory of Great Paektusan Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Victory of Great Paektusan Nation
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- It is the firm will and unshakable option of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to deal so deadly  blows at the brigandish U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors that they may not survive and to surely build a reunified thriving nation on this land to be envied by the world.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are fully ready to cope with any war, operation and battle chosen by the U.S. imperialists and fight any war, conventional or nuclear.
					
					 The U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors are kicking up a racket over "sanctions" and military pressure but they will get them nowhere.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have defended their socialist system and had access even to powerful nuclear strike means on the principle of self-reliance and self-development without any support and assistance from others.
					
					 In case the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces fire even a single shell at the inviolable seas, sky and land of the DPRK, they will have to regret their reckless actions taken without any reasonable judgment and measure.
					
					 The DPRK will keep taking strong military counteractions till the enemies are wiped out to the last man so that there would be no one to sign a surrender document.
					
					 Victory is in store for the army and people of the DPRK in the last decisive battle.
					
					 It is the eternal tradition of the great Paektusan nation to win victories.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Wiping out Aggressors, Provocateurs to Last Man
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Wiping out Aggressors, Provocateurs to Last Man
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- If the U.S. goes reckless to show even a slight sign of the movement to carry out a special operation and to encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, it will annihilate the worst provocateurs with a merciless preemptive nuclear strike and wipe the U.S. off the surface of the earth, warns Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The large-scale nuclear war maneuvers kicked up by the U.S. and other hostile forces bring the situation on the Korean peninsula, the biggest hotspot in the world, closer to the brink of a nuclear war, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 This proves that the reckless acts of the aggressors and provocateurs who challenged the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK have reached the unbearable limit.
					
					 The nuclear war maniacs should clearly understand who their rival is.
					
					 Enemies should not run amuck.
					
					 A preemptive attack is not the monopoly of the aggressors.
					
					 The military counteraction of the DPRK will be more preemptive and more offensive nuclear strike now that the enemies' joint military exercises are being staged as the most undisguised provocation against the dignity of the supreme leadership and sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: What Remains to Be Done Is to Retaliate against Enemies' Provocation by Force of Arms: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
What Remains to Be Done Is to Retaliate against Enemies' Provocation by Force of Arms: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Such grave situation where a war may break out anytime is now prevailing on the Korean peninsula because the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces have pushed the situation to the point of explosion by resorting to hideous provocations, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is set to ignite a war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The on-going "operation for advance into the northern inland area" in south Korea may go over to an actual battle anytime. 
					
					 Any warning of the DPRK never goes down with the U.S. as it insists on the showdown of force with the former. 
					
					 What remains to be done is to counter the U.S. with military muscle. That is a preemptive attack.
					
					 No one is allowed to blame the DPRK.
					
					 Running high are the hatred of all service personnel and people of the DPRK and their resolution to mercilessly wipe out the enemies keen to do harm to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Offensive means of the DPRK have been deployed to go into action, keeping the major striking targets in the operation theaters of south Korea within their firing range, and the powerful nuclear striking means of the DPRK targeting the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces bases in the Asia-Pacific region and the U.S. mainland are always ready to open fire.
					
					 Once the buttons of striking means are pushed, those means will be launched to bring a disaster and ruin to the U.S. This is an inescapable fate of the U.S. in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should not forget even a moment that the Korean People's Army's preemptive strike is by no means hot air.

articles.title: Punishment of Park Geun Hye Regime Called for
articles.content:
Punishment of Park Geun Hye Regime Called for
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in a statement Monday called for punishing the Park Geun Hye regime in south Korea by the concerted efforts of the people in the general elections scheduled in April.
					 Accusing Park of turning south Korea into the hell full of misfortune, pain, debt-triggered suicide and despair, the statement went on:
					
					 Park abused human rights of common people such as workers and peasants.
					
					 Unless the Park regime is punished in the general elections, a nuclear war may break out on the Korean peninsula to cause national disaster.
					
					 The Park regime should no longer be allowed to bring back the dark era.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands Authorities Lift Total Suspension of Operation of KIZ
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands Authorities Lift Total Suspension of Operation of KIZ
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the puppet government in Seoul on March 14, calling for retracting the total suspension of the operation of the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ), the symbol of the peace and the north-south exchange.
					 The organization said that south Korean businessmen and workers are suffering damage owing to the measure of total suspension of the operation of KIZ the regime took while talking about the "sanctions" against the north. The recent independent "sanctions" against the DPRK delivers a blow to the south Korean economy, the organization deplored.
					
					 It is unreasonable that honest and diligent people suffer with their shelter deprived overnight owing to the wrong policy of the regime, the organization noted, urging the authorities to lift the foolish "sanctions" and make a practical compensation to the affected enterprisers and workers.

articles.title: Campaign Launched by S. Korean Organizations to Defeat Group of Traitors in Election
articles.content:
Campaign Launched by S. Korean Organizations to Defeat Group of Traitors in Election
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in Pusan, south Korea have launched a campaign to defeat the group of traitors in the coming election.
					 More than thirty organizations in Pusan formed the Pusan citizens network for the 2016 General Elections to vote down those enforcing the unpopular rule.
					
					 The network held a press conference at the building of the Pusan City "Assembly" on March 14 at which five persons including Kim Mu Song, representative of the "Saenuri Party", its lawmaker Ha Thae Gyong were listed as the first group of those to be defeated among the candidates for the "National Assembly."
					
					 It said that it would make public the second group of those to be defeated to intensify the campaign.

articles.title: No-War Action Staged by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
No-War Action Staged by S. Korean Organization
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, staged no-war action in Seoul Tuesday.
					 Members of the organization projected video clips and distributed literature disclosing the danger of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					
					 They noted that the danger of a nuclear war is growing on the Korean peninsula due to the war drills aiming at attack, invasion and occupation of the DPRK and demanded an immediate halt to the drills.

articles.title: S. Korean Teachers Union Members Shave Their Heads
articles.content:
S. Korean Teachers Union Members Shave Their Heads
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The chairman and other core members of the Teachers Union of south Korea shaved their heads outside the building of the regime in Seoul on March 14 in protest against the authorities' suppression of the union, according to south Korean internet news Voice of People.
					 Ahead of the hair-cutting they held a press conference to denounce the present "government" for harsh suppression of the union by denying its existence and activities.
					
					 They declared they would demonstrate their will through hair-cutting to keep the union without fail and surely punish in the name of people the Park Geun Hye regime unless it stops the despicable suppression, though belatedly.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Russian organizations for the study of the Juche idea for celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed on March 13.
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to let all Russian organizations for the study of the Juche idea organize political and cultural events such as seminar on Kim Il Sung's works on the above-said occasions.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Czech, Russian Media
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Czech, Russian Media
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Czech and Russian media introduced the DPRK.
					 An article titled "Sci-Tech Complex, asset of Korean nation" was posted on the website Paektusan of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association on March 4. It said:
					
					 The Sci-Tech Complex successfully built on Ssuk Islet of the River Taedong in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, opened on the New Year's Day.
					
					 One can see the model of a satellite carrier rocket in the main lobby of the complex and tour inter-sector science and technology exhibition halls and e-libraries on each floor.
					
					 The complex, to which the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea for making all the people to be well versed in science and technology was perfectly applied, can provide information service enough to help everyone study to his heart's content as it is a comprehensive e-library.
					
					 Photos of the complex were also posted on the website.
					
					 The Russian newspaper Rossiskaya Gazeta carried an article introducing the Masikryong Ski Resort on March 7.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Guinea
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated with due ceremony in Dhaka on March 12.
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh who doubles as minister of Civil Aviation and Tourism, was elected honorary chairman of the preparatory committee, and MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The inaugural ceremony discussed the matters for giving wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and the successes achieved by the Korean people and organizing colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) in 2017.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported by Indian Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported by Indian Body
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its followers should clearly understand the sky-high retaliatory spirit of the Korean people.
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association said this in a statement on March 9.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises are the drills for a nuclear war that may bring unimaginable destruction to the world.
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces are working hard to occupy the whole of the Korean peninsula through the threat of nuclear attack and to shift the blame for the tensions caused by them on to the DPRK.
					
					 Just is the stand of the DPRK which declared that it would turn its mode of military counteraction into the one of preemptive attack to deal a merciless and annihilating attack at the enemies under the prevailing grave situation that they are getting desperate to infringe upon its dignity and sovereignty and people's right to existence.
					
					 The DPRK has already warned the U.S. imperialists and their followers not to seek to "bring down its social system", dismissing it as a day-dream.
					
					 The statement called on the peace-loving people in the world to extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle for ensuring peace in Asia and the rest of the world against the anti-DPRK hostile moves of the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Pakistan
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Pakistan
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A Pakistani national preparatory committee for celebrating the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Karachi on March 13.
					 Former Senator Amar Jit was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and to organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- An Ethiopian preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Addis Ababa on March 14.
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the President's revolutionary career and exploits on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Hails DPRK's Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article on March 10.
					 The news of the DPRK's launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 in February immediately became a hot topic of world media, exciting the world public, the article noted, adding:
					
					 Firstly, that is because it was unbelievable that the DPRK succeeded in the satellite launch despite the worst condition.
					
					 Whenever the DPRK launched satellites, the U.S. and its followers cooked up "resolutions on sanctions" of the UNSC in a bid to smother it and even deprive its people of their right to existence.
					
					 But the DPRK launched a satellite again.
					
					 Secondly, it is because the DPRK is undergoing a rapid development in exploring space.
					
					 The world public was so surprised to witness the DPRK successfully launching its first satellite Kwangmyongsong-1 in the 1990s when it faced the worst ordeals due to the U.S. moves to stifle it.
					
					 In a matter of less than 20 years since then the DPRK has made an eye-opening development, from a young space explorer to a space power.
					
					 Thirdly, it is because the DPRK is a space power both in name and reality.
					
					 It mapped out its own far-reaching blueprint for conquering space and has pushed ahead with it.
					
					 The DPRK is, indeed, a full-fledged space power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un' Work Posted by British Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un' Work Posted by British Body on Its Website
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on March 10.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un declara construccion de avenida Ryomyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un declara construccion de avenida Ryomyong
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, proclamo la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong a ser formada entre el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan y la cruce de Ryonghung y presento las tareas concernientes.
					　Aunque esta muy ocupado por dirigir dia y noche la campana de 70 dias castigando resueltamente con el espiritu de ataque del monte Paektu las maniobras de sancion y aplastamiento de los enemigas contra la RPDC, el Mariscal salio al terreno.
					
					　Mirando el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, supremo lugar sagrado del Juche en que estan conservados los cuerpos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la colina Ryongnam, donde este ultimo tomo el juramento historico "!Corea, te hare grande!", el Mariscal propuso poner el nombre "Ryomyong" a esta avenida que se construye en el lugar significativo donde nace el alba de la Revolucion Coreana.
					
					　Vio un proyecto de conformacion de la avenida Ryomyong, la vista a vuelo de pajaro, la maqueta, etc. el Mariscal dio las instrucciones que se necesitan para construirla como creacion monumental que muestra patentemente la idea del PTC de dar importancia a las ciencias y las personas competentes y el poderio de la Corea socialista.
					
					　Lo importante en la construccion de la avenida es construir magnificamente las viviendas de los educadores, cientificos e investigadores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, los edificios publicos y redes gastronomicas como la casa cuna, jardin infantil, lavanderia y correo, asevero y agrego que al mismo tiempo hay que impulsar la construccion del edificio No. 3 de la Universidad. 
					
					　El proposito del Partido es construir aqui la avenida economica en el uso de energia y la verde del siglo 21, subrayo.
					
					　Acoto que las unidades encargadas del diseno y la obra deben trabajar presentando la meta de solucionar la iluminacion y calefaccion de las viviendas y edificios publicos con la energia solar, la geotermia, el soleamiento natural, etc. y de convertir los edificios en los verdes instalando los invernaderos en las azoteas.
					
					　Dijo que dara la orden del Comandante Supremo del EPC para volver a enviar a los constructores militares, expertos en la construccion de la avenida de cientificos Mirae, a la obra de la avenida Ryomyong y subrayo la necesidad de darle asistencia activa de todo el partido, todo el pais y toda la sociedad y ponerse al frente de este trabajo el Consejo de Ministros, comites, ministerios y organos centrales.
					
					　Esta obra no es una simple conformacion de la avenida, sino sirve de un motivo politico que muestra claramente el impetu de Corea que avanza con valentia hacia el mundo levantando con mas firmeza pese a toda clase de sanciones y presiones de los imperialistas yanquis y sus satelites, el aspecto de Corea que marcha por la realizacion de los ideales supremos del pueblo y la decision de que podemos hacer todo lo que queremos y podemos vivir bien a nuestro estilo sin envidiar a nadie.
					
					　La construccion de la avenida Ryomyong deviene la enconada confrontacion con los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus satelites, subrayo y llamo fervientemente a terminar sin falta la obra en este ano para infundir la confianza y optimismo de la victoria a nuestro ejercito y pueblo y poner de pleno manifiesto la fuerza de la RPDC que abre su futuro radiante y la tradicion invencible de la Corea del Juche que el mundo no conoce ni puede conocer.
					
					　Le acompanaron los subjefes de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Jo Yong Won, Kim Yo Jong y Kim Chang Gwang.

articles.title: Pyongyang sera sede de XVIII Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Pyongyang sera sede de XVIII Festival de Kimilsungias
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, tendra lugar desde mediados de abril que viene el XVIII Festival de Kimilsungias en la Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia.
					En el certamen tomaran parte las instituciones de fuerzas armadas, ministerios, organos centrales, asi como los trabajadores de diferentes estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares, la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon y otras entidades de compatriotas en ultramar y los amigos extranjeros.
					
					Tambien se realizaran en las localidades las exposiciones de la flor inmortal y las visitas al invernadero de kimilsungias y kimjongilias.

articles.title: Japon debera admitir advertencia de sociedad internacional
articles.content:
Japon debera admitir advertencia de sociedad internacional
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, Japon se vale de todas las artimanas a fin de solucionar con metodos fraudulentos el problema de esclava sexual para el viejo ejercito japones, crimen antietico de categoria especial.
					Al responder el dia 7 a la pregunta formulada por el Comite de la Eliminacion de Discriminacion contra Mujeres de la ONU, las autoridades japonesas dijeron oficialmente que "no se han confirmado en ningun lugar las pruebas de arresto forzoso por el ejercito y los organos gubernamentales". Ademas, la cancilleria japonesa dio a la publicidad un archivo que dice: "no ha comprobado el hecho de arresto de consoladoras por el ejercito y los funcionarios del Estado".
					
					Citado por la ACNC, el Dr. Kim Pyong Chol de la Universidad Kim Il Sung dijo que tal actitud de las autoridades japonesas deviene el acto descarado tendente a negar a toda costa la verdad conocida por todo el mundo.
					
					En aquel pais isleno se divulga de continuo los argumentos gangsteril sobre los crimenes de esclavas sexuales cometidos en el pasado, lo cual deviene un desafio frontal a la verdad de la historia.
					
					Son incontables los datos que comprueban el hecho de que en el pasado los imperialistas japoneses llevaron por la fuerza a muchisimas mujeres de Corea y otros paises del mundo para convertirlas en las esclavas sexuales.
					
					Ya en la decada de 1990 fueron publicados no pocos datos reales, segun los cuales la capa militar y el gobierno de Japon organizaron directamente los crimenes de esclava sexual bajo el permiso de Hideki Tojo, premier de tiempo de guerra. Para colmo, hay datos de que hasta el rey japones se intervino en los crimenes de esclava sexual.
					
					En 2013 un profesor de la Gran Escuela de Relaciones Exteriores de la Universidad de Johns Hopkins de EE.UU. publico algunos datos aclarando que la instalacion de los "centros de esclavas sexuales" bajo la estricta disciplina fue permitida por las autoridades militares en todas las localidades en que estaban estacionadas las tropas japonesas.
					
					Tambien, los documentos secretos revelados en el archivo del Ministerio de Defensa mostraron los detalles de que el gobierno japones ordeno a todas las unidades militares la instalacion de los "centros de esclavas sexuales" y el arresto forzoso de las mujeres coreanas para gestionarlos.
					
					A pesar de estos datos reales, Japon habla cinicamente de la "prueba", lo cual parte del objetivo de racionalizar y justificar a toda costa los crimenes ensangrentados del pasado y preparar un trampolin de rehabilitacion de militarismo y de reagresion.
					
					Pero, la historia no se cambia nunca por alguna insistencia o negacion.
					
					Japon debera admitir con sinceridad la advertencia severa de la sociedad internacional teniendo presente que sus actos de encubrir los crimenes del pasado produciran el aislamiento y el arruinamiento de si mismo.

articles.title: Desarrollado nuevo medicamento anti-cancer en RPDC
articles.content:
Desarrollado nuevo medicamento anti-cancer en RPDC
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Instituto de Tumor de la Academia de Ciencias Medicas de la RPDC logro desarrollar nuevo medicamento anti-cancer.
					Fue confirmado que el nuevo medicamento, hecho con Sophora angustifolia, retono de aralia y Scutellaria baicalensis, es mas eficaz que la inyeccion anti-cancer Nosam (Sophora angustifolia) desarrollada en 2008. 
					
					El nuevo medicamento refrena la enzima que reproduce el cancer.
					
					A diferencia de los medicamentos anteriores que causaban el trastorno digestivo al atacar no solo las celulas cancerosas, sino tambien a las normales y rebajaba la inmunidad al disminuir notablemente el numero de globulo blanco, la nueva pastilla no tiene efectos adversos.
					
					En los ultimos anos, el instituto arriba citado y otros hospitales trataron con la nueva medicina a los pacientes que sufrian por el cancer de estomago inoperable en progreso. Su resultado fue extraordinario de lo que preveian los medicos.
					
					Tambien, se lograron ciertos efectos en el tratamiento de gastritis atrofica y otras enfermedades que podran pasar facilmente a cancer.
					
					El nuevo medicamento gana gran aceptacion de los funcionarios y obreros de la rama farmaceutica por su amplia fabricacion en las fabricas de medicinas tradicionales de todo el pais.

articles.title: Fuerzas armadas nucleares de RPDC aniquilaran a todos agresores, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Fuerzas armadas nucleares de RPDC aniquilaran a todos agresores, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- Si Estados Unidos muestra sin prudencia un minimo movimiento por desarrollar la operacion especial y violar la soberania de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, esta aniquilara con golpe preventivo nuclear a todos los provocadores y eliminara para siempre a EE.UU. en esta Tierra.
					Asi advierte el diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 18, y continua:
					
					Los simulacros de gran tamano de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles llevan al borde de guerra nuclear la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, zona mas candente del mundo.
					
					Esto muestra claramente que llegaron a la etapa mas intolerable las locuras imprudentes de los agresores y provocadores que desafiaron a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Los fanaticos a la guerra nuclear deben saber correctamente a su rival.
					
					Los enemigos deben actuar con prudencia.
					
					El ataque preventivo no es el monopolio de los agresores.
					
					Puesto que los ejercicios conjuntos militares de los enemigos fueron considerados como la provocacion mas abierta contra la maxima dignidad y soberania de la RPDC, nuestra contramedida militar se convertira en golpe nuclear mas preventivo y mas ofensivo.

articles.title: Unico remedio es enfrentarse con fuerzas militares, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Unico remedio es enfrentarse con fuerzas militares, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- En la Peninsula Coreana se ha creado la delicada situacion al borde de la guerra, cuya causa reside en que los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos llevan al limite de explosion la situacion recurriendo a las maniobras de la provocacion de gran tamano.
					Asi inicia el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. pretende provocar a toda costa la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					?Cuando pasa a la guerra real la "operacion de avance al interior" que se libra en el Sur de Corea? Esto es cuestion de tiempo.
					
					No surte efecto la palabra en cuanto a EE.UU. que se entrega a la confrontacion de fuerza con la RPDC. El unico remedio es enfrentarse con las fuerzas militares, o sea, con el golpe preventivo.
					
					Ahora llega al cielo la vehemente indignacion y el impetu de todos los militares y civiles de aniquilar despiadadamente a los enemigos que intentan atentar a nuestra maxima dignidad.
					
					Ya estan emplazados los medios de ataque que ponen al alcance del tiro los objetos principales de golpe de la zona operacional del Sur de Corea.
					
					Igualmente, los poderosos medios de golpe nuclear que apuntan a las bases de las tropas agresoras yanquis de la region de Asia-Pacifico y el territorio principal de EE.UU. estan siempre en estado de espera del lanzamiento.
					
					Si apretamos el boton, se lanzaran dichos medios y EE.UU. sufrira calamidades y se arruinara, lo cual es el destino inevitable del imperio yanqui.
					
					EE.UU. no debe olvidar ni un momento que dar el golpe preventivo demoledor del ejercito coreano nunca es una palabra vana.
